lines.gurmukhi: jYsy ismr ismr piRAw pRym rs ibsm hoie soBw dyq mon ghy mn muskwq hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Simar Simar Priaa Praym Ras Bisam Hoi , Sobhaa Dayt Mon Gahay Man Mousakaat Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a wife recalls her experience of pleasure with her husband and feels happy, becomes quiet and chuckles in her mind exhuming prettiness;

lines.gurmukhi: pUrn ADwn prsUq smY rodq hY gurjn mudq h√çY qwhI lptwq hY
lines.transliteration_english: Pooran Adhaan Parasoot Samai Rodat Hai , Gurjan Mudat Hvai Taahee Lapataat Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as on completion of her pregnancy, she goes into labour and cries due to pain but the elders of the house feel happy seeing the child and they shower love on him time and again;

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy mwnvqI mwn qRXwig kY Amwn hoie pRym rs pwie cup hulsq gwq hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Maanavatee Maan Tyaagi Kai Amaan Hoi , Praym Ras Paai Choup Hulasat Gaat Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as an honoured pretty woman sheds her pride and arrogance and becomes humble, and on receipt of her husband's love when united with him becomes quiet and smiles within.

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy gurmuK pRym Bgiq pRkws jws bolq bYrwg mon ghy bhu suhwq hY ]605]
lines.transliteration_english: Taisay Gurmoukh Praym Bhagati Prakaas Jaasa , Bolat Bairaag Mon Gahay Bahu Suhaat Hai ?605?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly, an obedient disciple of True Guru who experiences light divine as a result of his loving, perpetual meditation on Naam blessed by the Guru, he earns much respect and praise whether he speaks in a detached mood or goes silent in ecstasy.  (605)
